entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
